channel.title: Server trouble can anyone help me?
channel.description: i have my port and everything working i portforwarded and everything its really maken me mad it keeps saying my server is offline wen i just turned it on if i need an no-ip can some one tell me were to get one? www.no-ip.com just gives my number/192.168.2.11 i made this one work for me but i cant get the server on the moparscape server status and i tried for someone to log on to it but they said it didnt work.... :confused:

item.title: Server trouble can anyone help me?
item.dc:creator: @owner_37 owner 37
item.description:
@owner_37 wrote:

MsDos:

MoaprServer status takes 24 hours for it to appear in the server status page, it is proberly being examined by staff…

No it takes until the timer goes up, wich is 30minutes it says 24hours but if u look at hte bottom, it tells u howlong left. till they update it

Read full topic
item.source: Server trouble can anyone help me?

item.title: Server trouble can anyone help me?
item.dc:creator: @MsDos MsDos
item.description:
@MsDos wrote:

Well yes, it takes time for MoparScape to examine the server…

Otherwise people would be flamming the Status page with fake Ip and Servers.

Read full topic
